vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἔξειμι,
(εἰμί
__B sum), only used in impersonal forms (see. ἔξεστι), except in αἰ ἐλεύθεροι μὴ ἐξεῖεν if [a woman] shall leave no free-born issue, [Refs]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to leave, go out, go away
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to leave, go out, go away
to go out, or forth, Acts 13:42; to depart, Acts 17:15; 20:7; ἐπὶ τὴν γῆν, to get to land, from the water, Acts 27:43
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: bước ra; rời ra. ἐκ (G1537) + εἰμί (G1510)
